alert.note: Alert for Adams; Webster (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 18 at 6:34PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Webster and southwestern Adams Counties through 715 PM CDT... At 634 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Woodruff, or 13 miles north of Phillipsburg, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northwestern Webster and southwestern Adams Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
